languages.text: "Прежде чем мы покинем это место..." {n}Голос Ирлиэт вздрагивает.{/n} "Дозволь мне, элантах, обыскать тела павших. Я хочу забрать их камни душ — вместилища, что хранят нас от пасти Сай'лантреш после телесной гибели . Провидение Муарана вело этих воинов против нас — провидение, что может быть осквернено недобрыми намерениями, о коих не ведали они сами. Не дай их душам, заточенным в камнях, сгинуть".

"Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."
languages.original_text: "Прежде чем мы покинем это место..." {n}Голос Ирлиэт вздрагивает.{/n} "Дозволь мне, элантах, обыскать тела павших. Я хочу забрать их камни душ — вместилища, что хранят нас от пасти Сай'лантреш после телесной гибели . Провидение Муарана вело этих воинов против нас — провидение, что может быть осквернено недобрыми намерениями, о коих не ведали они сами. Не дай их душам, заточенным в камнях, сгинуть".

Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

"Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

"Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

languages.text: “在我们离开这个地方之前……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着。{/n}“请允许我搜寻阵亡同胞的尸体，外界人。我想收集他们的灵魂石。我们的肉体死亡之后，灵魂石会保护我们的灵魂不被赛·兰斯雷什吞噬。这些战士听从了穆兰的预言，与我们为敌，但那些预言可能早已被他们尚未察觉的邪恶力量腐蚀。他们的灵魂都保存在这些石头里，不要让他们在这里就此湮灭。”
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: “在我们离开这个地方之前……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着。{/n}“请允许我搜寻阵亡同胞的尸体，外界人。我想收集他们的灵魂石。我们的肉体死亡之后，灵魂石会保护我们的灵魂不被赛·兰斯雷什吞噬。这些战士听从了穆兰的预言，与我们为敌，但那些预言可能早已被他们尚未察觉的邪恶力量腐蚀。他们的灵魂都保存在这些石头里，不要让他们在这里就此湮灭。”

languages.text: 「ここを発つ前に…」{n}ユリエットの声は震えている。{/n}「戦死者の肉体を探してもかまわないだろうか、エランタ。亡くなった者の魂縛石を集めたい。魂縛石とは、我々が肉体の死を迎えた後、セランスレッシュのマウに入るのを防ぐための器。この戦士達と我らが対峙したのは、ムアランの思惑。その思惑が、当人も気づかなかった邪悪な意思によって潰えるとは。戦士の魂はこの石の中に封じ込められる。ここで消滅させるわけにはいかない」
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: 「ここを発つ前に…」{n}ユリエットの声は震えている。{/n}「戦死者の肉体を探してもかまわないだろうか、エランタ。亡くなった者の魂縛石を集めたい。魂縛石とは、我々が肉体の死を迎えた後、セランスレッシュのマウに入るのを防ぐための器。この戦士達と我らが対峙したのは、ムアランの思惑。その思惑が、当人も気づかなかった邪悪な意思によって潰えるとは。戦士の魂はこの石の中に封じ込められる。ここで消滅させるわけにはいかない」

languages.text: "Bevor wir diesen Ort verlassen ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert.{/n} "Erlaubt mir, die Körper der Gefallenen zu durchsuchen, Elantach. Ich möchte ihre Seelensteine einsammeln – die Behälter, die uns nach unserem physischen Tod vor Sai'lanthreshs Schlund schützen. Muarans Vorausschau hat diese Krieger gegen uns geführt – eine Vorausschau, die durch böse Absichten korrumpiert werden kann, von denen sie nichts ahnten. Ihre Seelen sind in den Steinen eingeschlossen – sie sollen nicht hier vergehen."
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor wir diesen Ort verlassen ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert.{/n} "Erlaubt mir, die Körper der Gefallenen zu durchsuchen, Elantach. Ich möchte ihre Seelensteine einsammeln – die Behälter, die uns nach unserem physischen Tod vor Sai'lanthreshs Schlund schützen. Muarans Vorausschau hat diese Krieger gegen uns geführt – eine Vorausschau, die durch böse Absichten korrumpiert werden kann, von denen sie nichts ahnten. Ihre Seelen sind in den Steinen eingeschlossen – sie sollen nicht hier vergehen."

languages.text: « Avant de partir... permettez-moi de fouiller les corps des morts, elantach, {n}demande Yrliet d'une voix tremblante.{/n} J'aimerais récupérer leurs pierres-esprits, les réceptacles qui nous protègent des mâchoires de Sai'lanthresh après notre mort physique. Ce sont les prédictions de Muaran qui ont dressé ces guerriers contre nous, des prévisions qui avaient peut-être été corrompues à son insu par des intentions malveillantes. Des âmes sont enfermées dans ces pierres, ne les laissez pas périr ici. »
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de partir... permettez-moi de fouiller les corps des morts, elantach, {n}demande Yrliet d'une voix tremblante.{/n} J'aimerais récupérer leurs pierres-esprits, les réceptacles qui nous protègent des mâchoires de Sai'lanthresh après notre mort physique. Ce sont les prédictions de Muaran qui ont dressé ces guerriers contre nous, des prévisions qui avaient peut-être été corrompues à son insu par des intentions malveillantes. Des âmes sont enfermées dans ces pierres, ne les laissez pas périr ici. »

languages.text: «Antes de que nos marchemos...». {n}Dice Yrliet con voz temblorosa.{/n} «Déjame buscar en los cuerpos de los caídos, elantach. Me gustaría recoger sus joyas espirituales, los receptáculos que nos protegen de las fauces de Sai'lanthresh tras nuestra muerte física. Las visiones de Muaran llevó a estos guerreros al combate en nuestra contra, y es posible que esas visiones estuvieran corrompidas con intenciones siniestras que nunca llegaron a conocer. Sus almas están encerradas en esas joyas: no dejes que mueran aquí».
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de que nos marchemos...». {n}Dice Yrliet con voz temblorosa.{/n} «Déjame buscar en los cuerpos de los caídos, elantach. Me gustaría recoger sus joyas espirituales, los receptáculos que nos protegen de las fauces de Sai'lanthresh tras nuestra muerte física. Las visiones de Muaran llevó a estos guerreros al combate en nuestra contra, y es posible que esas visiones estuvieran corrompidas con intenciones siniestras que nunca llegaron a conocer. Sus almas están encerradas en esas joyas: no dejes que mueran aquí».

languages.text: "Buradan ayrılmadan önce..." {n}Yrliet'in sesi titriyor.{/n} "İzninle cesetleri arayacağım elentach. Ruh taşlarını toplamak istiyorum. Bunlar, fiziksel ölümümüzün ardından bizi Sai'lanthresh'in ağzına düşmekten koruyan birer araçtır. Bu savaşçılar Muaran'ın öngörüleriyle, farkında olmadıkları kötü niyetlerce yozlaştırılabilen öngörüleriyle karşımıza çıktılar. Ruhları bu taşların içinde kilitli, burada yok olmalarına izin verme."
languages.original_text: "Before we leave this place..." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles.{/n} "Allow me to search the bodies of the fallen, elantach. I wish to collect their spirit stones — the vessels that protect us from Sai'lanthresh's maw after our physical death. Muaran's foresight led these warriors against us — foresight that can be corrupted by ill intentions they were unaware of. Their souls are locked within these stones — don't let them perish here."

traits.locale_text: "Buradan ayrılmadan önce..." {n}Yrliet'in sesi titriyor.{/n} "İzninle ölülerin bedenlerini arayacağım elentach. Ruh taşlarını toplamak istiyorum. Bunlar, fiziksel ölümümüzün ardından bizi Sai'lanthresh'in ağzına düşmekten koruyan birer araçtır. Bu savaşçılar Muaran'ın öngörüleriyle, farkında olmadıkları kötü niyetlerce yozlaştırılabilen öngörüleriyle karşımıza çıktılar. Ruhları bu taşların içinde kilitli, burada yok olmalarına izin verme."
